titles: Whereas the fish-market at Billingsgate, by reason of the dismal fire and other accidents, hath for some late years been in much disorder, and yet continues without that due regulation ...
author: City of London (England).
Ford, Richard, Sir, d. 1678.
notes: Title from first four lines of text.
